TextView.android:text: Aircraft (Choppers, Fighters and Bombers) have a limited amount of fuel. This means that once the fuel has been exhausted, they'll crash at the end of the turn.
The yellow highlighted squares show the fuel range - so make sure you've got enough fuel to get back to a city or a Carrier.
Aircraft can refuel by entering a city or boarding a Carrier.
NOTE: Aircraft burn one unit of fuel just staying airbourne at the end of a turn even if they didn't move.
NOTE: Choppers will automatically land if they're over grassland, so they can avoid burning additional fuel.
